com.treatment

Class PatientControler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.treatment.PatientControler

  • public class PatientControler
extends java.lang.Object
    PatientControler class contains all functions needed to certify the information sent by the user to the Patient Object
    This class contains 1 public functions and 10 private functions
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    C.DEBAISIEUX

      private static boolean checkUpAvailableAreaCode(javax.swing.JTextField text)
      this function is used to certify that the area code is correct
      A loop is used to compare the area code written by the user to the area code in arrayAreaCode If it matches codeOk is set on true
      private static boolean checkUpAvailableCellphoneNumber(javax.swing.JTextField text)
      this function is used to certify that the cellphone number is correct
      If the phone number start with one of the beginning number of the array If it matches phoneNumber is set on true
      private static boolean checkUpAvailableEmail(javax.swing.JTextField text)
      this function is used to certify that the Email is correct
      The email is stored in a String variable IndexOf is used to check the @ in the email address The information isn't correct the boolean fieldOk is set on false An error message is sent to the user
      private static boolean checkUpAvailablePhoneNumber(javax.swing.JTextField text)
      this function is used to certify that the phone number is correct
      If the phone number start with one of the beginning number of the array boolean phoneNumber is set on true
      private static boolean checkUpJDateChooserDateInput(com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser birthdateField)
      this function is used to certify that the Date is correct
      In a try / catch block the date selected in the JDateChooser field is stored in a Date Object If the Date isn't null boolean fieldOk is set on true if an error occurs, the catch block set the examination date to default date at today
      private static boolean checkUpJRadioButtonInput(javax.swing.JRadioButton JR1, javax.swing.JRadioButton JR2)
      this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user is correct
      Those two JRadioButton are member of a same ButtonGroup, it doesn't allow them to have the same value If those two have the same value so no selection has been done by the user FieldOk is set on false
      private static boolean checkUpJTextFieldIntInput(javax.swing.JTextField text)
      this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user is correct
      If the ExceptionControler.numericException return true The information isn't correct the boolean fieldOk is set on false An error message is sent to the user
      private static boolean checkUpJTextFieldLongInput(javax.swing.JTextField text)
      this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user is correct
      If the ExceptionControler.numericLongException return true The information isn't correct the boolean fieldOk is set on false An error message is sent to the user
      private static boolean checkUpJTextFieldStringInput(javax.swing.JTextField text)
      this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user is correct
      If the text is null or void An error message is sent to the user , fieldOk is set on false If the ExceptionControler.stringException return false An error message is sent to the user , fieldOk is set on false
      private static boolean checkUpSsnLength(javax.swing.JTextField text)
      this function is used to certify that the social security number is correct
      If the length of the String is aquals to 15 ssnLength is set on true else an error warning is sent to the user

      • inputFieldControler

        public static boolean inputFieldControler(javax.swing.JTextField idField,
                                          javax.swing.JRadioButton maleRButton,
                                          javax.swing.JRadioButton femaleRButton,
                                          javax.swing.JTextField nameField,
                                          javax.swing.JTextField fNameField,
                                          javax.swing.JTextField addressField,
                                          javax.swing.JTextField areaCodeField,
                                          javax.swing.JTextField townField,
                                          javax.swing.JTextField ssnField,
                                          javax.swing.JTextField eMailField,
                                          javax.swing.JTextField phoneField,
                                          javax.swing.JTextField cellphoneField,
                                          com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser birthdateField)
        this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user are corrects
        Ten different functions are used If all the functions return true so the boolean fieldOk keep is status on true
        Parameters:
        idField - : specify the id of the Patient for the moment writting manually but will be improve to be set automatically
        maleRButton - : the gender of the patient male is set on true if the Patient is a male else set on false
        femaleRButton - : the gender of the patient female is set on true if the Patient is a female else set on false
        nameField - : the name of the patient
        fNameField - : the first Name of the patient
        addressField - : the address of the patient
        areaCodeField - : the area code of the patient
        townField - : the city of the patient
        ssnField - : the social security number of the patient
        eMailField - : the email address of the patient
        phoneField - : the phone number of the patient
        cellphoneField - : the birthDate of the patient
        birthdateField - : the birthDate of the patient
        Returns:
        a true or false boolean
        See Also:
        checkUpJTextFieldIntInput(JTextField), checkUpAvailableEmail(JTextField), checkUpJTextFieldIntInput(JTextField), checkUpAvailablePhoneNumber(JTextField), checkUpAvailableCellphoneNumber(JTextField), checkUpAvailableAreaCode(JTextField), checkUpJTextFieldLongInput(JTextField), checkUpSsnLength(JTextField), checkUpJRadioButtonInput(JRadioButton, JRadioButton), checkUpJDateChooserDateInput(JDateChooser)

      • checkUpJTextFieldStringInput

        private static boolean checkUpJTextFieldStringInput(javax.swing.JTextField text)
        this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user is correct
        If the text is null or void An error message is sent to the user , fieldOk is set on false If the ExceptionControler.stringException return false An error message is sent to the user , fieldOk is set on false
        Returns:
        a true or false boolean
        See Also:
        ExceptionControler.stringException(JTextField)

      • checkUpJTextFieldIntInput

        private static boolean checkUpJTextFieldIntInput(javax.swing.JTextField text)
        this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user is correct
        If the ExceptionControler.numericException return true The information isn't correct the boolean fieldOk is set on false An error message is sent to the user
        Parameters:
        text - : a String information written by the user
        Returns:
        a true or false boolean
        See Also:
        ExceptionControler.numericException(JTextField)

      • checkUpJRadioButtonInput

        private static boolean checkUpJRadioButtonInput(javax.swing.JRadioButton JR1,
                                                javax.swing.JRadioButton JR2)
        this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user is correct
        Those two JRadioButton are member of a same ButtonGroup, it doesn't allow them to have the same value If those two have the same value so no selection has been done by the user FieldOk is set on false
        Parameters:
        JR1 - : a JRadioButton with a specific boolean value
        JR2 - : a JRadioButton with a specific boolean value
        Returns:
        a true or false boolean

      • checkUpJDateChooserDateInput

        private static boolean checkUpJDateChooserDateInput(com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser birthdateField)
        this function is used to certify that the Date is correct
        In a try / catch block the date selected in the JDateChooser field is stored in a Date Object If the Date isn't null boolean fieldOk is set on true if an error occurs, the catch block set the examination date to default date at today
        Parameters:
        birthdateField - : the birthDate of the patient
        Returns:
        a true or false boolean

      • checkUpAvailableEmail

        private static boolean checkUpAvailableEmail(javax.swing.JTextField text)
        this function is used to certify that the Email is correct
        The email is stored in a String variable IndexOf is used to check the @ in the email address The information isn't correct the boolean fieldOk is set on false An error message is sent to the user
        Parameters:
        text - : a String information writen by the user
        Returns:
        a true or false boolean
        See Also:
        String.indexOf(String), String.endsWith(String)
